description: Etched lets you play /b/custom music/b/. Place a /b/Blank Music Disc/b/ and a /b/Record Label/b/ in an /b/Etching Table/b/ to start /6/making a disc/6/. /6/Insert a link/6/ to etch onto the disc.
You can insert discs into /b/Boomboxes/b/ to play music on the go.
/b/Radios/b/ will /6/play music right from a link/6/.
/6/Insert a URL/6/ that leads to an /b/MP3, WAV or OGG file, SoundCloud or Bandcamp song, or a Minecraft Sound Event./b/
